content.text: Hi I'm Emily, I'm from Boston.
Hello Emily, I'm from a suburb of Boston too. My name is Sarah.
What do you like to do for fun?
I love nature and I have a rose garden that I love to take care of.
That sounds lovely, I enjoy going for walks in nature.
Me too, it's a great way to relax and clear your head.
I also enjoy listening to music, do you have any favorite bands?
I love Pearl Jam, they're my favorite band.
Oh wow, me too! They're so good.
I saw them in concert a few years ago and it was amazing.
That's awesome, I wish I could have seen them live.
It was a great experience, I hope you get to see them someday.
Thanks Sarah, it was nice to meet you.
You too Emily, have a nice day.
